title.narrative: Mining companies that have submitted local procurement plans according to the new regulations, and verified by MC.
Forestry Management plans approved for selected Forest Reserves by FC and MLNR.
Number of District Mining Committees established, trained and equipped
Forestry Development Master Plan revised and validated and related training on its implementation provided
Revenue forecasting model for the NRM sector in place and operational at the Ministry of Finance
Guidelines on conduct of consultations with non state actors engaged in the NRE sectors through a participatory process by TCC.
Review of schemes on tree tenure and benefit-sharing drafted in a participatory process
Nationally Appropriate Mitigation Action plan fully finalized (costed and time-bound)
Climate Change Support and Impact Monitoring Disclosure System (CCSI-MDS) project database on mitigation and adaptation publicly accessible
Plantation Strategy drafted by Forestry Commission and submitted for consultation with state and non-state stakeholders
